sentence.Network_en: With his wonted , collected and stately mien, he crossed the unhallowed threshold.
sentence.Network_cn: 他摆出平时那种泰然自若的庄严态度, 跨过那个污浊的门槛.

sentence.Network_en: A nation without much religious emotions , China is becoming even more irreverent and unhallowed.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个本就没有宗教感的国家,变得更加的肆无忌惮, 更加的缺乏神圣感.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unhallow 亵渎unhallowed 不圣洁的unhand 放掉
a. 未使神圣的,不神圣的,污渎的同反义词同: [a.] unholy 反: [a.] holy 英英解释形容词解释: not hallowed or consecrated [同] unhallowed, unholy.
